text: Estelle Louise Fletcher (July 22, 1934 – September 23, 2022) was an American actress. She won many awards for her television and movie acting. She is most famous for playing the main antagonist "Nurse Ratched" in the movie One Flew over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975). That earned her an Academy Award for Best Actress, a BAFTA Award, and a Golden Globe Award in 1976. She was also well known for her role as the Bajoran religious leader "Kai Winn Adami" in the television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine (1993–99). She acted in many other movies and television series. On September 23, 2022, Fletcher died at her home in Montdurausse, France, at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other webbsites== * * * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Birmingham, Alabama Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths
title: Louise Fletcher
